synopsis.text: Something extraordinary happens when Kana Sakuragi, a diligent college student with an impressive memory, encounters a magical girl startup company. Despite her unsuccessful job hunting endeavors at more than 15 companies, Kana finds herself in the midst of an unexpected career path: becoming a Magical Girl! In a world where "Kaii" - a type of natural disaster - wreak havoc, Magical Girls are the professionals tasked with exterminating these monsters. As Kana embarks on her new work-life journey at Magilumiere Magical Girls Inc., she discovers that the office environment is anything but ordinary. With excitement, challenges, and high rewards, Kana's life takes a thrilling turn as she joins the ranks of magical girls, proving that sometimes, luck can change in the most unexpected ways.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
